DOC.detailed_description: Cycle A1 : prednisone-cyclophosphamide pre-phase ( 5 day ) , Rituximab day 0 , chemotherapy day 1-5 ( dexamethasone , iphosphamide , vincristine , high-dose methotrexate , triple intrathecal therapy ) . Cycle B1 : Rituximab day 0 , chemotherapy day 1-5 ( dexamethasone , vincristine , cyclophosphamide , high-dose methotrexate , adriamycin , triple intrathecal therapy ) Cycle C1 : Rituximab day 0 , chemotherapy day 1-5 ( dexamethasone , vindesine , high-dose methotrexate , etoposide , high-dose cytarabine ) . Cycle A2 : like cycle A1 , without pre-phase . Cycle B2 : like cycle B1 . Cycle C2 : like cycle C1 . Cycle C2 follow two additional Rituximab injection . Notes : 1. patient stage I-II disease without mediastinal tumor extranodal involvement receive first 4 cycle ( A1 A2 ) . 2. patient age > 55 year receive cycle C ( sequence : A1 , B1 , A2 , B2 , A3 , B3 A1 , B1 , A2 , B2 limit stage , reduced-dose methotrexate ) .
